title: 3D deconvolution / upsampling
body_html: I was hoping to re-implement a FCN for 3D image segmentation. If I understand correctly upsampling + convolution is equivalent to deconvolution. Would it be straightforward to implement 3D upsampling starting from your 2D upsampling code? Thanks.
body_text: I was hoping to re-implement a FCN for 3D image segmentation. If I understand correctly upsampling + convolution is equivalent to deconvolution. Would it be straightforward to implement 3D upsampling starting from your 2D upsampling code? Thanks.
